thread.title: Tahini Is a Surprisingly Tasty Smoothie Ingredient
thread.title_full: Tahini Is a Surprisingly Tasty Smoothie Ingredient

author: Claire Lower
title: Tahini Is a Surprisingly Tasty Smoothie Ingredient
text:
Photo by Quinn Dombrowski . 
A good smoothie should be creamy, cold, and smooth . Sure, you can add milk to help with the texture, but not everyone wants to start their day with dairy. For a smooth, creamy, slightly nutty blended beverage, Epicurious takes a page from the book of hummus and employs the power of tahini. Why You Should Put Tahini in Your Blondies (and Other Sweets) Why You Should Put Tahini in Your Blondies (and Other Sweets) Why You Should Put Tahini in Your Blondies (and… Tahini is a sesame paste most commonly used in hummus, baba ghanoush, and salad dressings, but it… Read more Read more 
I’m already a big fan of tahini in desserts , so this move makes sense to me. According to Tommy Werner, the sesame paste plays a role here similar to the one it plays in hummus, mixing in and providing a pleasing texture without distracting from the other ingredients. Just add in a tablespoon or two—perhaps into a date shake?—and enjoy the rich, creamy goodness tahini brings to the party. Advertisement
